mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tournament_stage ( tournament_id, type, status, order_num, name, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{tournamentId}, #{type}, #{status}, #{orderNum}, #{name}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
